channel.title: Draygntiy Old School Runescape!
channel.description:
[center]Hello! Welcome to the official thread for Draygnity![/center]
[center]We are currently in testing stages of the game, looking for major bugs and letting players test the game. This is what we have to offer so far[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] -Working music & sounds.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] -Working bows & throwing knives.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2m31m44.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] -All prayers work - Burying bones - Working altars.
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/34tdb8x.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2rmnsp0.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] -Woodcutting all trees - axes.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] -Prospecting rocks - Mining all rocks.
[img]http://www.runehq.com/image/skills/cooking_small.gif[/img] -Cooking all fish - Meat.
[img]http://www.runehq.com/image/skills/fishing_small.gif[/img] -All fishing works.[/center]
[center][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101020171527/runescape/th/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img] -All working spells & Ancients.[/center]
[center][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043727/runescape/images/archive/8/84/20091231200714!Agility-icon.png[/img] -Gnome & wildy course.[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/25ir9sy.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://www.runescapemmorpg.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/attack_icon.gif[/img] -All melee combat working.
[img]http://runescape.neoseeker.com/w/i/runescape/9/93/Runecrafting_icon.gif[/img] -Abyss runecrafting.
[img]http://www.runehq.com/image/skills/slayer_small.gif[/img] -Working slayer tasks.
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/archive/f/f0/20091231200715!Farming-icon.png[/img] -Herb farming.
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043730/runescape/images/archive/f/f1/20091231200715!Herblore-icon.png[/img]
-Working potions & Cleaning herbs.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img]Quests! :
*Dwarf Cannon (working cannons too)
*Horror from the deep
*Lost City
*Romeo & Juliet
*Rune Mysteries
*The Mage's Challenge
*Dragon Slayer
*Cook's assistant
*Witch's Potion
*Gertrude's Cat
*Champions' Challenge[/center]
[center]-Working fun duels, you don't lose things!
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34t74oi.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/archive/f/f3/20110305012553!Thieving-icon.png[/img]-Working thieving from stalls & npc's.
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2lvzbi8.png[/img][/center]
[center]Falador, Draygnity home![/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1j9k3t.png[/img][/center]
Chatbox: http://draygntiy.allalla.com/Xat.html
Client:
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35255160/Site/THEGAWDDAMNCLIENT.jar

item.title: Draygntiy Old School Runescape!
item.dc:creator: @nathanz nathanz
item.description:
@nathanz wrote:

so your pretty much saying you have perfect everything? Lol don’t make me laugh, if you want a true FLAWLESS old school go to www.last-chapter.org

item.description:
@anti-crime wrote:

[center]Hello! Welcome to the official thread for Draygnity![/center]

[center]We are currently in testing stages of the game, looking for major bugs and letting players test the game. This is what we have to offer so far[/center]

[center] -Working music & sounds.

-Working bows & throwing knives.

-All prayers work - Burying bones - Working altars.

-Woodcutting all trees - axes.

-Prospecting rocks - Mining all rocks.

-Cooking all fish - Meat.

-All fishing works.[/center]

[center] -All working spells & Ancients.[/center]

[center] -Gnome & wildy course.[/center]

[/center]

-Abyss runecrafting.

-Working slayer tasks.

-Herb farming.

-Working potions & Cleaning herbs.

Quests! :

*The Mage’s Challenge

*Dragon Slayer

[center]-Working fun duels, you don’t lose things!
